hiveArticle.title: SBD Trading More than $20 in HitBTC
hiveArticle.body:
Just Checked the CoinMarketCap, and saw that SBD is trading at $20.25.

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXhj4wvaLZqubKZbKkU1aygNoKNPeaMJmFVi1F98m5vFc/image.png)
PC : https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/steem-dollars/#markets

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXNGz7UL32uJgKEUNiVs87nGK8GpRmoszSMRWBTX8BfM6/image.png)
PC : https://hitbtc.com/market-overview/overview

Seems like a selective outrage only in HitBTC, where the reason is unknown to many.
